website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced 3-in-1 staple gun kit with a staple remover and 900 staples.
pros: This versatile, die-cast aluminum-steel staple gun accepts D-type, U-type, and T-type staples and has an adjustable tension setting that allows you to easily change the staple gun's firing pressure to customize it for the task at hand
cons: Occasionally a faulty unit slips through quality control, but the company is customer service driven, so replacement typically isn't a problem

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this is a bundle package with exactly what I needed at an affordable price and seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: wvartist

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool for home project.
customer_reviews.text: This staple gun looks well made. I used this to fix my kid's folding table and chair. The staple gun is lightweight and easy to use. The staples drive into hardwood surfaces with ease. It comes with various staples & brads in the package. I would recommend this for home projects!
customer_reviews.author: Dazuiatsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Stapler
customer_reviews.text: This stapler arrived quickly and is everything we expected at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five star waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers said that the staples were crappy. I'm here to tell you it's not the staples! I bought Arrow 10mm 3/8" sharp tip staples and it still miss fired 3 out of 5 staples. I replaced the stapler same brand just to see if I got one that was defective. Guess what?? Same problems!!! Bent staples or staples to hammer in or it jams!! Don't waste your time or money on this product if you're working with anything but a soft pine. Also good to note- it didn't load a full time of staples.
customer_reviews.author: Lynxsynx

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool for the price and purpose!
customer_reviews.text: We have used it and it works perfectly in all situations without needing to pay a high price. It's the perfect decorative and restorative upholstery decorative tool. My wife and I can both use it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Chad & Gina Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Good 4 simple arts & crafts, give this a try.
customer_reviews.text: Little difficult to use in awkward spaces. Heavier than expected (for me) I would pay a little extra for sturdier staple gun and for lasting results. If using for simple arts and crafts, give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I guess it’s ok. I used it to staple a power cord in my garage. My main issues, is there were no instructions at all...nothing!
customer_reviews.author: tone

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective product, and seller has agreed to refund my money. I guess I just got a bad one. Seems heavy duty, better luck on the next one.
customer_reviews.author: TrainTec

customer_reviews.title: Bad stapler, good puller
customer_reviews.text: The puller is handy and very good quality, the stapler is junk and stopped working after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Trundle

customer_reviews.title: Staples aren’t useable
customer_reviews.text: Gun and remove work great. One thing that sucks is most of the staples provided are not use able and there are two packs. I was able to reupholster only two chairs with the amount of Staples that were useable. And I have four chairs left!
customer_reviews.author: Audriana

customer_reviews.title: Staples suck/ gun is good
customer_reviews.text: Works great for standard staple jobs. However, please be aware that 1. The staple is extremely tight and hard to squeeze. 2. The staples provided are cheap knockoffs, and dont work as well/shoot as well as a standard t-rated staple should
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: This broke within the first 15 minutes of use. Just trying to staple a small piece of carpet to a garage step.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Beltz

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Broke after using it twice. I didn’t even get through one sleeve of staples.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: Staple gun did not work well on oak chair. Perhaps can be used for something else later.
customer_reviews.author: shawnielea

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of the staple remover, the product was extremely poor
customer_reviews.author: lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Very usefull!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this type of Staple Gun and have to tell that is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Loading problems but worked good
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems loading it but then it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Hard to squeeze & Jammed almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Do you not believe anybody when they say this is easy on the hand. It was incredibly hard to push and got jammed by the 20th staple. Return not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: MJ Lepley

customer_reviews.title: Fun tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is a joy to use. I build birdhouses and it works perfectly for them.
customer_reviews.author: Popi

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Its solid material, easy to use and solution of the many problem which needed to be fixed. With this tool i fixed many things of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Great husband gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. He uses it in woodworking and hanging wires
customer_reviews.author: Judy

product_meta.title: Amy 3 in 1 Heavy Duty Staple Gun with Staple Remover Tack Lifter, Hand Operated Stainless Steel Stapler Brad Nail Gun, Furniture Stapler, Upholstery Gun, 900 Staples Attached, Black
product_meta.description: This set contains a 3 in 1 stapler and a nail puller that allows you freely use it for different upholstery projects, such as furniture binding, cupboard nailing, wardrobe tacking and any other stapling works. While the nail puller is designed to quickly remove staples in secs, and also used for opening up keyrings to get keys or key accessories off and on. It's so functional that worth you every penny! Features: ✔Adopting the principle of spring spring-back impact, just use your hands to operate without other Mopha Staple Gun works with 3 different staples: D-type, U-type, T-type staples Perfect for Fixing Material, Decoration, Carpentry, Furniture, Doors, Windows, Billboards, Securing Plastic Sheeting and much more Compact design with no loose parts Easy drop-in loading with reload indicator Handle lock for easy storage Elegant soft rubber grip for extra working comfort Heavy duty, all-steel construction for strength & durability Ergonomic handle for comfort & reduced fatigue Unique staple loading & clearing mechanism for fast & convenient use Handle safety locking system prevents accidental operation Supplied with 600staplesSpecifications: Color: Blackmailer Weight: 535g/1. 18lb/18. 87ozNail Remover Weight: 90g/0. 20lb/3. 17ozNailer Dimensions: 15. 5x13. 7x2cm/6. 1"x5. 4"x0. 8"Nail Remover Dimensions: 18x3. 5x3cm/7. 1"x1. 4"x1. 2"PackageIncludes: 1 x Heavy-Duty Staple Gun1 x Nail Remover300 x D-type Staples300 x U-type Staples300 x T-type Staples-NOTICE-Keep there is no staples in the gun, when you don’t use it. The staple gun can only be used for work piece, and must not be aimed at humans or animals.
feature_bullets: 3-in-1 Staple Gun - Special binding groove allows easily insertion of Door-type, U-type and T-type staples to meet various tacking needs, Plus, soft gel inserted the handle protects your hands from rubs and blisters in working.

Pressure Setting - Adjustable pressure setting to make sure you get the right pressure for the task at hand. Adjust pressure to suit the thickness of the material you are working with. Unique force adjustable knob design allows you to freely adjust the force based on binding materials, effort saving and hand fatigue reduced, perfect as a staple gun, brad nailed, cable and wire tacker.

Long-lasting Durability - Heavy Duty die-cast aluminum-steel construction & Chrome-plated steel construction for long-lasting durability, anti-abrasive and corrosion resisting, super sturdy for upholstery, wood working, ceiling tiles, rack and roofing. Adopting the principle of spring spring-back impact, it doesn't need electricity or gas as it's power source.

Quick Nail Puller - 1mm thick of the puller head with Lever Principle design and ergonomic anti-slip handle, more effort saving that easily slides under staples to remove them, also minimize the damage to stapled surface. Light weight and portable, used for simple removal of both staple legs from wood, cartons, boxes, furniture, etc.

100% Satisfied Service - s All of It's Products and Tools for Life! If the tool does have a defect, we will gladly repair or replace it, at our discretion. email us for any query and we will be in touch within 24 hours. Hope you would have happy shopping experience.

specifications.Included Components: 1 x Heavy-Duty Staple Gun 1 x Nail Remover, 300 x D-type Staples 300 x U-type Staples 300 x T-type Staples
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars51 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
